attributes.action: Cheap car insurance for young drivers
attributes.additional_details:
Petition to get young drivers on the road by lowering car insurance which is ridiculously expensive. £3000 is cheapest on 1.2litre car which for A level Students is not feesable and even full timers near impossible to pay! Lets get car insurance prices down and help get the economy back on track with it.
More drivers = more people buying petrol, more tax and more money into the economy
